DOC.brief_summary: Primary objective: Mean values of systolic and diastolic office blood pressure Secondary objectives: Total mortality, occurrence of cardio- and cerebrovascular events, change of mean blood pressure (ABPM : Ambulatory Blood Pressure Monitoring) during the observation
DOC.criteria: no previous antihypertensive therapy highnormal blood pressure according to the JNCVI definition (systolic 130 139 and/or diastolic 85 89 mmHg) antihypertensive therapy blood pressure greater 140/90 mmHg or ABPM greater 135/85 mmHg
